name: Tales of the Rays: Recollection
summary:
Recollection is the next major update for Tales of the Rays and was shown on the games 6th anniversary broadcast.

With the main story of the game completed at the end of the 4th scenario, Last Cradle, this update for the game will introduce a new story with 6 new characters.
So far a new system, Successive Stories, involving older titles from the franchise has been shown and a combat system overhaul was also revealed.

Another stream is planned for March 30th with more information about the update.
